brand.name: UniX AI
brand.description: Embodied intelligent robotics company founded in 2024 in Suzhou, China. Develops full-size wheeled and bipedal humanoid robots with Unitouch visual-tactile large model technology for commercial service applications.

robots.name: Wanda 2.0
keyFeatures: 8 DoF Biomimetic Arms with end-point positioning accuracy ≤0.5mm
Zero Noise Chassis for quiet operation
Adaptive Smart Gripper for versatile manipulation
Dual-Axis Flexible Head with comprehensive sensors
8-16 hours battery life with fast charging
982 mm arm span with 6kg payload per arm

hardwareBuildQuality.totalDegreesOfFreedom: 8 DoF biomimetic arms with shoulder-elbow-wrist design (4+1+3 configuration)
hardwareBuildQuality.payloadCapacity: 6 kg per arm, suitable for precise manipulation tasks
hardwareBuildQuality.batteryCapacityRuntime: 8-16 hours operation time with intelligent power management
hardwareBuildQuality.charger: Fast charging system with intelligent battery management

softwareEcosystem.rosSupport: ROS/ROS2 compatible with full API support
softwareEcosystem.apiDocumentationQuality: Comprehensive documentation with examples and tutorials

warranty.coverage: Hardware defects, software support, and technical assistance

supplierReliability.postSalesSupport: 24/7 technical support with remote diagnostics and on-site service
supplierReliability.trackRecord: New company founded 2024 with experienced team from top robotics institutions

robots.description: Wheeled dual-arm humanoid robot with 8 DoF biomimetic arms and zero-noise chassis, designed for versatile home services, office cleaning, and intelligent reception scenarios.

robots.name: Martian
keyFeatures: Total 23 degrees of freedom (6 legs + 7 arms + 1 waist + 2 head)
EtherCAT bus system for precise control

hardwareBuildQuality.totalDegreesOfFreedom: 23 DoF total (6 per leg, 7 per arm, 1 waist, 2 head)
hardwareBuildQuality.payloadCapacity: 30-50 kg heavy payload capacity for commercial applications
hardwareBuildQuality.batteryCapacityRuntime: 9 Ah battery capacity at 57.6V (max 67.2V) with intelligent power management
hardwareBuildQuality.charger: High-voltage fast charging system with safety protection

softwareEcosystem.rosSupport: Full ROS/ROS2 support with comprehensive API
softwareEcosystem.apiDocumentationQuality: High/low layer API interfaces with comprehensive documentation

warranty.coverage: Hardware defects, software support, OTA updates, and technical assistance

supplierReliability.postSalesSupport: 24/7 technical support with OTA upgrade capability and remote diagnostics
supplierReliability.trackRecord: New company founded 2024 with experienced team from top robotics and AI institutions

robots.description: Full-size bipedal humanoid robot with high-speed movement capabilities and heavy payload capacity, designed for family service, office cleaning, and commercial applications.
